backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister’s data models for photos, videos, events, special moments, footer content, profiles, filters, and upload requests, including comparison helpers and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that converts old orders to a new format by adding a default Pending status to each order.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for order‑status functionality, mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, SEO metadata, and loading the main React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React router, global layout, theme provider, visitor recording, and route definitions for all site pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventManag: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, and managing events, including images and passwords.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterEdit: Form UI for editing footer contact details and social media links, using query hooks to load and update data.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersSect: Admin interface to view, filter, create, edit, update status, and delete orders with modal dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Handles selecting, previewing, batching, and uploading photos with progress tracking and deletion support.
frontend/src/components/admin/Shortlists: Displays user shortlists grouped by event with statistics and event filtering.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpecialMom: Allows admins to create special moments and upload images with compression, progress tracking, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserStatis: Shows photo-related statistics such as totals, likes, averages, and most‑liked photos with a table view.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoUploa: UI for selecting, uploading, previewing, and deleting videos with progress tracking and admin controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/VisitorsSe: Admin table displaying paginated site visitors with roles, timestamps, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessHelpe: UI helper shown when a user lacks admin rights, displaying their principal and instructions for obtaining admin access.
frontend/src/components/EventPasswordPro: Modal dialog for entering and validating a password to access protected event pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with contact email, social links, and credits using data from footer content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, authentication handling, and optional admin link support.
frontend/src/components/PhotoActions.tsx: Displays like and download buttons for a photo, handling auth checks and download logic.
frontend/src/components/PhotosViewer.tsx: Fullscreen photo viewer with escape-to-close, scroll lock, image display, and action controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and save their name.
frontend/src/components/RouterNotFoundRe: Redirects unknown photo detail routes to the gallery and shows a not‑found fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Applies SEO meta tags for pages based on predefined configs and optional overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, admin checks, media, events, and orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for swipe navigation functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark cinematic themes, base styles, scrollbars, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/blob-utils.ts: Utilities for converting ExternalBlob objects to URLs or bytes, converting images to JPEG, and downloading single or multiple images.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Functions for updating meta tags and Open Graph data plus predefined SEO configurations.
frontend/src/lib/time-utils.ts: Helpers to convert backend nanosecond timestamps to dates and formatted strings and vice versa.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point mounting React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page handling authentication, admin checks, and rendering admin management sections.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessInfoPage.tsx: Business info page showing services and contact details, using SEO metadata and footer content.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Event detail page showing event info and gallery with lightbox view using blob URLs.
frontend/src/pages/EventPage.tsx: Displays a detailed event page with authentication, password prompts, image shortlist toggling, and image downloading.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows a sortable list of events with authentication gating and a cinematic UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a favorites page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a cinematic hero section, service highlights, and navigation to galleries.
frontend/src/pages/MediaGroupPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for a media group page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoDetailPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for a photo detail page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Displays sortable photo gallery with viewer modal and scroll restoration.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for a portfolio page.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Generates and displays an XML sitemap client-side.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentPage.tsx: Shows a special moment gallery with image downloads and batch download support.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentsPage.ts: Displays a gallery of special moments with sorting, loading states, and cinematic UI effects.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Shows a video gallery with authentication gating, sorting controls, and a modal video viewer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, fonts, and component theming.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including feature requests and order management requirements.
